text: Yadi tomara striderake sparsa na kare athaba mahara nirdharana na kare'i talaka da'o, tabe tomadera kono aparadha ne'i [1]. Ara tomara tadera kichu sansthana kare dibe, sbacchalatara sadhyamata ebam asbacchalatara samarthanuyayi, bidhimata sansthana karabe, eta muhasina lokadera opara kartabya
